title: Android 11 - Hide notch problem
content: I have problems on my pixel 3 xl after i updated to android 11. After a few months, i realized that when i change the notch (turn off, turn back om) my gesture navigation wont work, i cant go to home directly and i cant go to recent apps. after that, when i turn off the notch, and i screen record it, the video will squeeze down like this üëáüèª
